^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ACVoltage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more AC voltage sensors.
ACVoltage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure AC voltage.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Amperage.description: Contains the array of 1 or more amperage sensors.
Amperage.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure amperage.

Energy.description: The Energy for this AC Input.
Energy.longDescription: This property shall indicate the Energy information of this AC Input.

Frequency.description: Contains the array of 1 or more frequency sensors.
Frequency.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure frequency.

Humidity.description: Contains the array of 1 or more humidity sensors.
Humidity.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure humidity.

MemberId.description: This is the identifier for the member within the collection.
MemberId.longDescription: The value of this string shall uniquely identify the member within the collection.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

RmsUnderOverVoltage.description: The RMS Under/Over Voltage for this AC Input.
RmsUnderOverVoltage.longDescription: This property shall indicate the RMS Under/Over Voltage information of this AC Input.

Temperature.description: Contains the array of 1 or more temperature sensors.
Temperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure temperature.

AcInputActions.description: The available actions for this resource.
AcInputActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Transformer.description: This is the schema definition for a Transformer.
Transformer.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent a Transformer for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AcInput.description: This is the definition for AC Input.
AcInput.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AC Input for a Redfish implementation.

AcOutput.description: This is the definition for AC Output.
AcOutput.longDescription: These properties shall be the definition for AC Output for a Redfish implementation.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Alarms.description: Contains the naivgation pointer to the equipment Alarm collection.
Alarms.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type AlarmCollection that contains the alarms for the equipment.

AssetTag.description: The actual Asset Tag of Transformer.
AssetTag.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Asset Tag of Transformer.

DateOfManufacture.description: The date of manufacture of Transformer.
DateOfManufacture.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual date of manufacture of Transformer.

FirmwareRevision.description: The actual Firmware Revision of Transformer.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Firmware Revision of Transformer.

HardwareRevision.description: The actual Hardware Revision of Transformer.
HardwareRevision.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Hardware Revision of Transformer.

LiquidLevel.description: The actual Liquid Level of Transformer.
LiquidLevel.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual internal Liquid Level status of Transformer.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Manufacturer of Transformer.

Model.description: The actual Model Number of Transformer.
Model.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Model Number of Transformer.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

PartNumber.description: The actual Part Number of Transformer.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Part Number of Transformer.

PhysicalLocation.description: The actual Physical Location of Transformer.
PhysicalLocation.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Physical Location of Transformer.

PowerFactor.description: The actual Power Factor of Transformer.
PowerFactor.longDescription: The value of this property shall represent the actual Power Factor of Transformer.

Pressure.description: Contains the array of 1 or more pressure sensors.
Pressure.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure pressure.

Sensors.description: The naivgation pointer to the collection of sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.
Sensors.longDescription: This property shall be a reference to a resource of type SensorCollection that contains the sensors located in the equipment and sub-components.

SerialNumber.description: The actual Serial Number of Transformer.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the actual Serial Number of Transformer.

Temperature.description: Contains the array of 1 or more temperature sensors.
Temperature.longDescription: The value of this property shall be an array of sensors that measure temperature.

TriggeredAlarms.description: Contains the array of 0 or more triggered alarms.
TriggeredAlarms.longDescription: This array shall contain the set of Members of the Alarm Collection which have an 'AlarmStatus' of 'Triggered'.
